title: Assignments
no-information: It is possible that the student never opened this assignment. No information was found about this student assignment

task-handler.confirm-undo: Are you sure you want to undo approval for {{student}}?

deliver-assignment.title: Deliver assignment
deliver-assignment.label: Unique Delivery URL
deliver-assignment.hint: Share the link with the student
deliver-assignment.confirm-ignore: Are you sure you want to ignore this task for {{student}}?

review-assignment.title: Assignment Review
review-assignment.comment-placeholder: Comment or feedback for the student (optional)
review-assignment.no-review-required: This project can be approved without requiring review since it was not necessary to send any file or url

code-review.info-student: This project needs to have at least 3 code reviews in order to be accepted or rejected by your teacher.
code-review.info-teacher: This project needs to have at least 3 code reviews in order to be accepted or rejected.
code-review.feedback-will-be-shown-here: The teacher's feedback will be shown here if it's approved
code-review.why-approve: Why are you approving this assignment?
code-review.why-reject: Why are you rejecting this assignment?
code-review.student-has-no-files-to-review: The student has no files to review yet. But you can still approve or reject the assignment, and leave a comment.
code-review.student-has-no-files-but-has-been-approv: The student has no files to review yet. But the assignment has been approved.
code-review.code-review-successfully-sent: The code review was sent successfully.
code-review.select-file-to-review: Select the file you want to review from:
code-review.assignment-approved-msg: Your teacher has approved your project.
code-review.assignment-rejected-msg: Your teacher has rejected your project.
code-review.teacher-has-reviewed-your-code: {{name}} has reviewed your code and provided the following feedback:
code-review.selection-code-text: You have made your selection, please confirm to start your code review by clicking on the following button. Otherwise select another piece of the code.
code-review.use-your-mouse-to-select-code: Use your mouse to select the part of the code you want to give feedback about.
code-review.did-feedback-useful: Did you find this feedback useful?
code-review.code-review-started-msg: Code review has stared: Please give some feedback about the code based on the coding guidelines. You can read more about the guidelines
code-review.teacher-has-not-reviewed-files: Your teacher has not reviewed any files yet. try again later.
